Description: Black steatite cylinder seal: perforated through the centre and slightly broken at one end. The seal bears an incised inscription. Good condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit II (Wiesbaden, 1964), 1178; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit III (Wiesbaden, 1964), pl. 117, abb.680.
Exhibition history: 2015, 19th June - 5th Sept. Wrexham County Borough Museum. Egyptian Written Culture. 2016 12 Mar-8 May, Carlisle, Tullie House, Writing for Eternity 2016 20 May-4 Sept, The Salisbury Museum, Writing for Eternity 2016 16 Sept-10 Jan 2017, Abergavenny Museum, Writing for Eternity 2017 21 Jan-21 May, Museum of Hartlepool, Writing for Eternity
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
